item.title: BXP Z ProMods & RusMap RC 155.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 21, 2025

BXP Z ProMods & RusMap RC 155.1 ETS2

– ProMods and Zubarev RusMap road connector
– CONTAINS: complete road connection for ProMods and RusMap
– FEATURES: no additional dependency
– COMPLETED: all needed + extra roads
– INCOMPLETE: nothin reported
– DEPENDENCY: ProMods and RusMap (Zubarev VK)
– SPECIAL THANKS: SCS, Sergey061 (R.I.P.), aldimator, Sergey Zubarev and ProMods

Credits: BXP

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Iveco tector 31-300 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 21, 2025

Iveco tector 31-300 v1.0 ETS2

Engine: FPT N67, 6-cylinder in-line, 6.728 cm³ displacement. It’s a turbo-intercooler diesel engine with electronic common rail injection.

Performance:
Maximum Power: 300 hp (220 kW) at 2,500 rpm.
Maximum Torque: 1,050 Nm (107.1 kgfm) at 1,250 to 1,900 rpm.

Transmission: Eaton Ultrashift Plus automated transmission with 10 forward gears and 1 reverse.
Dimensions and Weights:
Total Gross Vehicle Weight (GVW):
Technical: 30,780 kg
Legal: 29,000 kg

Maximum Traction Capacity (CMT): 36,000 kg
Payload Capacity (technical): up to 22,869 kg (for short-cabine models)

Suspension:
Front: Mechanical with parabolic springs, hydraulic shock absorbers, and a stabilizer bar. The second steering axle has a pneumatic lift.
Rear: Mechanical “rocker arm” type with semi-elliptical springs. The third axle has a pneumatic lift.

Credits: alemão do grau

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: MB LS 1938 TECH GAMES v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 21, 2025

MB LS 1938 TECH GAMES v1.0 ETS2

Features of the Mod
A well-made MB LS 1938 mod for ETS2 typically includes:
Detailed Models: The mod will feature a highly detailed 3D model of the truck’s exterior and a custom interior.
Customization: The mods often come with a wide range of customization options, allowing you to personalize the truck to your liking. This can include:
Chassis: Different chassis configurations (e.g., 4×2, 6×2, 6×4).
Engines & Transmissions: Multiple engine options with various horsepower ratings (some realistic, others “chipped” or more powerful for gameplay).
Accessories: A vast array of accessories, such as custom bumpers, sun visors, lights, antennas, and unique interior items like curtains and dashboards.
Sounds: A key feature of a good truck mod is the custom sound pack. Mod creators work to replicate the real-life sounds of the Mercedes-Benz OM 457 LA engine to enhance the immersion.
Compatibility: Mods are regularly updated to be compatible with the latest versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Always check if the mod is compatible with your current game version before downloading it.

Credits: rafael alves

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: MB 1935 gratis v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 21, 2025

MB 1935 gratis v1.0 ETS2

YouTube: Many mod creators in the Brazilian community use YouTube to showcase their work. They often provide download links in the video description. Search for terms like “MB 1935 ETS2 download grátis,” “MB 1935 ETS2 mod,” or “MB 1935 ETS2 free.”
Modding Websites: Websites like Sharemods, Mediafire, or dedicated mod sites often host free mods. Be cautious and make sure the mod is from a reliable source to avoid viruses or corrupted files.
Steam Workshop: While many mods on the Steam Workshop are for minor changes (like skins or accessories), some modders do release full truck mods. It’s a great place to check for free, high-quality, and up-to-date content.

Credits: daniel braça

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: SCANIA 113H RAFA SHOP PISC v5.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 21, 2025

SCANIA 113H RAFA SHOP PISC v5.0 ETS2

SCANIA 113H: This is a classic Brazilian-style truck, often called “Scania Bicuda” due to its extended nose. It’s an iconic vehicle in Brazil, and it’s very popular among modders for ETS2.
RAFA V5: “Rafa” likely refers to the mod creator, often associated with a YouTube channel like “Rafa Gamers.” The “V5” indicates that this is the fifth version of the mod, suggesting it has received multiple updates, improvements, and new features over time.
SHOP PISC: This probably refers to a modding platform or store where this specific version of the mod is either sold or showcased. It is common for modders to release both free and paid versions of their work, with paid versions often having more exclusive features or being more frequently updated.

Credits: rafa game

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
